constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 156 (Friday, September 10, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. RUIZ:
H.R. 5239.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, section 8, Clauses 1 and 18 of the United
States Constitution, to provide for the general welfare and
make all laws necessary and proper to carry out the powers of
Congress.
[Page H4518]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on the Constitution, Civil Rights, and Civil Liberties.

title: Good Samaritan Health Professionals Act of 2021
